title: Red Steel 2 (Wii) Playthrough â€” Part 1
description: Got this game after finishing the first one. It's already 100x better. Only issue I have with it is that you can't jump or crouch, and the game seems very linear despite the sort of hub zone style levels. But the fact that the game runs at 60 fps and the actual game mechanics work instantly makes it better.
